remarks.format: ## Remarks If is a visual element, and are identical.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this item should not be re-virtualized.
Docs.value: `true` if you want to prevent revirtualization of this item; otherwise `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets an instance of the visual element that represents the data value.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement"> that represents the data value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs.Value%2A> is a visual element, its property value will be the same as UIElement.

Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Object"> that represents the original data value.
